description.fullscreen: Run in fullscreen mode. The window will be moved to the given display, if provided.
description.kiosk: Run in kiosk mode. Caution: It might be difficult to quit the app.
description.menu: Enable a menu and certain shortcuts useful for debugging.
description.volumeThreshold: Required volume to be exceeded before recording is started (range: [-100,0]).
description.idleTimeout: Reset the program after being idle for the given number of seconds. Values <=0 disable the reset.
